  • Method Details

    • isWeekend

      boolean isWeekend()
      Parameters:
      day - the day of the week
      Returns:
      true if the day is a weekend day (Saturday or Sunday)

    • getBeverage

      Beverage getBeverage(int itemNo)
      returns the beverage listed in the itemNo of the order, for example if itemNo is 0 this method will return the first beverage in the order Note: this method returns the shallow copy of the Beverage
      Returns:
      the beverage listed in the itemNo of the order or null if there is no item in the order

    • addNewBeverage

      void addNewBeverage(String bevName, SIZE size, boolean extraShot, boolean extraSyrup)
      adds coffee order to this order
      Parameters:
      bevName - beverage name
      size - beverage size of type SIZE
      extraShot - true if the coffee beverage has extra shot , false otherwise
      extraSyrup - true if the coffee beverage has extra syrup , false otherwise

    • addNewBeverage

      void addNewBeverage(String bevName, SIZE size)
      adds alcohol order to this order
      Parameters:
      bevName - beverage name
      size - beverage size

    • addNewBeverage

      void addNewBeverage(String bevName, SIZE size, int numOfFruits, boolean addPRotien)
      Adds the Smoothie beverage to this order
      Parameters:
      bevName - beverage name
      size - beverage size
      numOfFruits - number of fruits added
      addPRotien - true if protein is added, false otherwise

    • calcOrderTotal

      double calcOrderTotal()
      Calculates and returns the total amount for this order
      Returns:
      total amount for this order

    • findNumOfBeveType

      int findNumOfBeveType(TYPE type)
      returns the number of beverages of same type in an order
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the beverage
      Returns:
      number of beverages of type type in this order
